name: sentry
title: Sentry
description: Monitor errors and issues from Sentry. Supports multiple organizations.
setup_instructions: Add your Sentry organizations. You can configure multiple orgs with different tokens.

fields.name: organizations
fields.label: Organizations

item_fields.name: slug
item_fields.label: Organization Slug
item_fields.help: The short name of your organization (e.g., 'sytex', 'sytex-eu'). Found in Sentry URL: https://YOUR-ORG.sentry.io

item_fields.name: token
item_fields.label: Auth Token
item_fields.help: Create at Settings > Auth Tokens. Scopes needed: project:read, event:read

item_fields.name: url
item_fields.label: Sentry URL
item_fields.help: Base URL. Use https://sentry.io for cloud, or your self-hosted URL

fields.help: Add one or more Sentry organizations

fields.name: default_org
fields.label: Default Organization
fields.help: Which org to use when --org is not specified. Leave empty to use the first one.
